title: Flakes
content:
i'm working on a logo for a fotolog called (daily) flakes. you can have a look at [www.ew72.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20140806235718/http:/www.ew72.com/).   
I tried to do some traditional letters with a little bite. Does anyone have some advice about the lettering? greetings mvm ![flakes](http://web.archive.org/web/20140806235718im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/4100/32749.gif)
author: mvm
